advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
description:
Imagine a service as easy to use as your TV, only smarter and more personalized. That's Showyou.

Showyou is tuned to your tastes and interests, available on all your devices. You can use Showyou on your iPad, iPhone or iPod Touch to power your TV if you have an Apple TV (via Airplay) or Chromecast.

Our new Channel Guide puts you in charge of the channel lineup.  There are 100,000s of channels to choose from, including:

-- New fan-funded premium channels including IndieFlix (with 1000s of short films, documentaries and features) and AboveAverage, the online comedy network from SNL producer Lorne Michaels' Broadway Video.  More coming soon, so check back every day and directly support the channels you love with an in-app subscription.

— Channels from the NY Times, Vice, Laughing Squid, The Verge, Vevo and hundreds of other media companies and Internet publishers;

— Channels for each of your favorite social networks so you can see videos your friends and people you follow share; 

— And channels made by people who have made their own personal channel on Showyou with videos they’ve found and shared. 

When you launch the app, we’ll pick just the right thing for you to watch from among all the channels you follow. Don’t like what’s on? It’s just a tap to change channels. And you can browse through customized guides and category guides to find something specific.

Sound to good to be true? Here’s what others have said over the years:

AppStore: Great Free Apps, Favorites, 2014
AppStore: Best of 2011 and Best of 2012 
One of "Ten Essentials Apps" in AppStore, Social Networking for iPad 
AppStore, "TV Time" (iPhone and iPad) 

Named a top video app by The Verge, Wired, ABCNews, HuffingtonPost, TechCrunch, ReadWriteWeb and more. 

"Showyou brings in all the videos from your various social networks, including Facebook, Twitter, YouTube and more. It displays them for you in a glorious, sweeping grid organized by magic." Jon Mitchell, ReadWriteWeb 

“Version 2.0 of Showyou features a redesigned iPad UI that is really fantastic looking… It feels like the way video browsing should be done on a tablet.” MG Siegler, TechCrunch 

“A well-designed and well-conceived video app that utilizes all the best features of the iPad in its interface.” from Best Free Video iPad Apps by Jason Gilbert, Huffington Post 

"It really shines on the iPad" 
John Gruber, Daring Fireball 

“It’s the most interesting thing to happen to online video since YouTube.” 
Complex Magazine 

Follow us on Twitter, @showyouapp. 

Like us on Facebook, Facebook.com/showyouapp
releaseNotes:
Improvements for iOS8, including a share extension that enables Showyou users to share videos from web pages to their Showyou channel or watch later list.

Better support for iPhone 6 and 6+.

Improved "My Channels" list, with 1-tap to get to your favorite channels.

Bug fixes and performance improvements.
